original_text: And there he found a certain man named Aeneas, which had kept his bed eight years, and was sick of the palsy.
korean_text: 거기서 애니아라 하는 사람을 만나매 그는 중풍병으로 침상 위에 누운 지 여덟 해라

sentences.original_text: And there he found a certain man named Aeneas,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그곳에서 에네아스라는 어떤 사람을 만났는데,

sentences.original_text: which had kept his bed eight years,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 팔 년 동안 침상에 누워 있었고,

sentences.original_text: and was sick of the palsy.
